attributes.action: to institute a national on line crime reporting website which is monitored and run by police officers who are responsible for ensuring the crime which is reported is investigated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
